title: FIFA 22 Ultimate Edition
description: FIFA 22 Ultimate Edition includes: - 4600 FIFA Points Powered by Football™, EA SPORTS™ FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode. This game includes optional purchase of virtual currency that can be used to acquire a random selection of virtual in-game items through “packs”. EA displays pack probabilities in-game. See ‘Loot box drop rates’ below for information on how probabilities are calculated.
notes: PERSISTENT INTERNET CONNECTION, EA ACCOUNT, & ACCEPTANCE OF EA USER AGREEMENT (terms.ea.com) REQUIRED TO PLAY. EA'S PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY APPLIES (privacy.ea.com). YOU CONSENT TO ANY PERSONAL DATA COLLECTED THROUGH YOUR USE OF EA’S SERVICES BEING TRANSFERRED TO THE UNITED STATES, AS FURTHER EXPLAINED IN THE PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY. ACCESS TO SOFTWARE CONTENT IS LIMITED TO ONE EA ACCOUNT & IS NON-TRANSFERABLE AFTER PURCHASE. AGE RESTRICTIONS APPLY, SEE http://o.ea.com/ea/child-access. EA MAY PROVIDE CERTAIN FREE INCREMENTAL CONTENT &/OR UPDATES. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON ea.com/service-updates. FIFA 22 ULTIMATE EDITION NOT AVAILABLE IN BELGIUM. FIFA POINTS NOT AVAILABLE IN BELGIUM.
